name: lollipop
author: sudospace
description: lollipop is a friendly and lovely cli youtube downloader for you.

scripts.make-linux-x64: npm run build && pkg --targets node20-linux-x64 --compress GZip dist/app.js -o build/lollipop-linux-x64
scripts.make-linux-arm64: npm run build && pkg --targets node20-linux-arm64 --compress GZip dist/app.js -o build/lollipop-linux-arm64
scripts.make-win-x64: npm run build && pkg --targets node20-win-x64 --compress GZip dist/app.js -o build/lollipop-win-x64
scripts.make-win-arm64: npm run build && pkg --targets node20-win-arm64 --compress GZip dist/app.js -o build/lollipop-win-arm64
scripts.make-macos-x64: npm run build && pkg --targets node20-macos-x64 --compress GZip dist/app.js -o build/lollipop-macos-x64
scripts.make-macos-arm64: npm run build && pkg --targets node20-macos-arm64 --compress GZip dist/app.js -o build/lollipop-macos-arm64
